name: Tenner
description: Tenner is a sports prediction game that allows fans to experience the excitement of betting without the financial risk. Tenner is free to play, but pays out cash prizes to players who can answer a series of questions about a sports match correctly. Tenner is a social game allowing players to compete against friends in private leaderboards and live chat during the game.

team.name: Frederick Drapkin
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder & CEO of Tenner. Previously growth & product at Growth Street. Degree in Neuroscience from Oxford.

jobs.title: CTO
jobs.description:
We’re looking for a CTO to join Tenner and help build a truly novel and engaging second-screen experience for fans watching live sports.


——————-

What is Tenner?


We’re building a free-to-play sports prediction game that allows fans to win cash prizes for correct predictions, without any risk of losing money.


We aim to replicate the excitement of sports betting, but with no financial risk. We are combining this model with the social and competitive aspects of fantasy sports, and the exciting, real-time format of live quiz apps such as HQ Trivia.


A prediction game in this format does not currently exist. Unlike the majority of traditional sports prediction games, Tenner can be played by anyone, regardless of their location, age or favourite sport.


——————-

Where We’re At?



Having founded the company within IMG’s Greenhouse incubator program in January 2019, we raised rounds of funding in August 2019 and January 2020.


We launched a beta web app, acquired our first 2,500 customers, and agreed sponsorship deals generating the company’s first revenue.

We then released our mobile app on both [iOS](https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/tenner-sports-prediction/id1482274546) and [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.foresightmobile.tenner). 

We're now looking to build out the product, make our first few hires, and rapidly scale our user base.


——————-

The Role



We are looking for a full time CTO. Your primary responsibilities would be to build our mobile application and to structure and manage the technology side of the business as we grow our user base.


Applicants must:

- Have experience building and launching mobile applications, preferably mobile games
- Be driven, independent, and passionate about entrepreneurship & early-stage startups

We prefer applicants that:

- Have startup experience (whether an ex-founder or having worked in an early-stage startup)
- Already live in London or are willing to move to London (or close by) in the future
- Have an interest in mobile games or sports


——————-

What We Offer

- The opportunity to become the CTO of startup that’s already been through the validation phase, and closed two rounds of funding
- A generous equity package (experience based)
- Salary (experience based)
- Flexible working
